Samuel Ofori Amponsah (amụrụ na Machị 2, 1974), nke a makwaara dịka Maazị All 4 Real, bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwú nke Ghana si Agogo, Ashanti Region, Ghana. N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ wepụtara abọm iri na anọ, nke kachasị ọhụrụ bụ "Million Dollar," nke a tọhapụrụ na 2020
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị mma na narị afọ nke 21 na Ghana.
Ọ meriri ihe nrite asaa n'otu abalị na onyinye 2006 VGMA, gụnyere 2005 Artist of the Year, ma nwee ngụkọta nke 17 Ghana Music Awards nhọpụta, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị nka kacha elu ahọpụtara
Samuel Ofori Amponsah mere egwuregwu mba ụwa na London, New York, Chicago na Sierra Leone
Egwu ya nwere mmetụta R&B dị arọ
Ya na ndị dị ka Kofi Nti, Barosky, K
Fosu na Daddy Lumba arụkọ ọrụ
Ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ya kacha ewu ewu bụ "Asew", "Lady," "Emmanuella," "Odwo", na "Otoolege."
